content.detailedDescription: We saw this glowing starlike ball hovering over the ocean. than is started to go down like the sun,it was so bright it started to hurt my eyes just to look at it!!It also left a glow on the ocean water like the moon does on the ocean. it started to change colore like redish and orange and a glowing bluish white color. the light got bright and than it seemed to dim. there was allota aircraft in the area and boats in the harbor..I would think someone else saw this!! as it asended down and appeared to be moving farther and farther away,it turned redder!! than it was like a little red dot than dissapered!!This is the 3rd time ive seen this object this year!!
content.summary: It was a glowing starlike ball of light...But than started to change colors and decend over the ocean..It was amaizing..It looked like a helecopter was going to fly by it,,but they stopped and hovered far away as if they were looking at it.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking our three dogs for a walk down our drive way.I was headed west and say a large bright light off to my left.It was large and changing colors.I went back to the house as fast a possible to get my binocs and camera. went back out and watched it for a few more minn. then went in to the house and went up stairs to get a better look, as it was going out of sight. i knew it was a ufo when i first saw it,nothing casts a light like it did . it moved so slowly that it looked like it was standing still at first. nothing could be that far away and be that big.The center was a large white ball shape that cast  light off to its sides ,that must of been miles long.The light changed  slowly, not like you see satellites at night change colors but slow.It just kept moveing w.Sw. till it reached the tree line and i lost sight of it.My feeling at the time were mixed.I knew that it was a ufo but my camera is a piece of crap. i text my friend in town to look for it . but she could not see it. i wass pissed ,becouse if i had taken the dogs out earlyer i would have gotten a better and longer look at it. and maybe i could have gotten on video like the last one i seen.
content.summary: Round sphere,white, that cast changing colors of light to the sides ,very slow

content.detailedDescription: I was 4 years old and my two brothers were 12 and 14.  we were moving some dirt around in the backyard of our home. my brothers remember hearing a screaching sound, which sent them running to the front yard to hopefully see a cool car speeding away. after their disappointment they returned to the back where we noticed, near the same time, a disk shaped ship hovering over the back of our next door neighbors house. i saw the door slide open and a short (3 foot tall) ape-like being walk out onto a narrow catwalk that appeared to encircle the ship. he walked a few steps to my right and kneeled down and opened a small door on the side of the craft. he used a small tool to make some type of adjustment, and closed the small door before returning inside. while he was out, a second being walked to the door and watched him. the second guy was taller, maybe 5 feet. they were both covered in thick brown hair, but well groomed. both were wearing a coverall but not anything resembeling a space suit like our nasa guys wear. after the door slid back down, the ship started ascending at a slow speed. when it reached about 100 feet, it ascended almost straight up and out of sight in 1 or 2 seconds. the beings made no audible communication between each other, and didn't pay any attention to the 3 boys silently staring at undoubtable proof of life on other planets. my brothers knew they were looking at alliens, i didn't. i knew i had never seen anything like this before, but i wasn't old enough to know what an allien was. my oldest brother and i remember almost all the details the same, but our middle brother is now schitzofrenic. his recollection is light years away from what really happened.
content.summary: Visiting et's witnessed by 3 brothers 30 feet away.

content.detailedDescription:
November 23rd, 7:20-7:30, richmond ca. sky very clear, moon in last quarter.

dogs wanted to go out. when i opened door i was shocked to see a craft hovering approx. 1/4-1/2 mile away and less than 1,000' altitude. i live 1 mile from the bay and it was inland, seeming to sit just above neighbor's trees, absolutely no sound. it was circular, like an air filter, was my first thought, had walls of white lights about 10-25' high--1/3 as wide, like rectangular windows, very thin darker partitions between them. they went completely around, between 8 and 12 on visible side; a few red and one blue that mostly remained constant, very slight red flicker above and below. i ran in house to get camera [samsung sl502 on auto]and craft slowly started to move north when i returned one minute later, then veered nw, as if following bay shoreline. there were no shadows, no beamed lights from underneath, just the row of bright white windows, like an observatory, red on top flickering slightly, blue underneath. 

i posted pics immediately on facebook and sunday received an email with link to video taken in oakland on same night, november 23rd, that had just been put up:

[youtube link moved to fi section/cms/tg]

this is exactly what i witnessed, except for movement, and the rear light i saw was in front on their video.
the dogs did not react and i sensed no malevolence. the pics will need to be enlarged. i was afraid camera didn't capture anything, but you will see it is same craft as in video, albeit more pix-elated.
content.summary: Less than 1 mile away, under 1,000' altitude. white, a few red, one blue lights

content.detailedDescription: Loud music woke me, which i assumed came from a car outside. (there actually was no music from a car.) i went to 2nd floor window facing south and there appeared to be a search light on a star which came from the right of the star. i looked at it for less than a minute and the star and searchlight both disappeared. the odd thing was that later that day , i turned on my tv and the same song was playing that woke me up (jim croce's "operator.")
content.summary: Searchlight toward star , then both star & searchlight disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Six adults and two small children were just finishing dinner at my sister's house in trooper, pa. when, at about 9 pm, my brother-in-law went out to the mailbox to check for mail.  he came running back in excitedly yelling, "hurry, everybody come outside before you miss it".  we all went out on the front porch and looked up.  there were about 12 bright lights, yellowish-white, flying in formation almost directly above us.  they appeared to be fairly low (500-1,000 ft. high) in the sky and were absolutely silent and moving slowly. we observed them for about 5 minutes until they flew out of sight.  i even went into the back yard where there was no noise and cupped my ear to the sky as the last one passed, but there was still no sound at all.  i called 911 and reported the incident and the dispatcher said there was another report and the police were checking it out.  he said they would call me back if they learned anything and, at about 11:15 that night they called me back to tell me there was a similar report from someone in willow grove, but that they still did not determine anything more.  i contacted the air force and they suggested calling the faa.  the faa suggested i contact mufon.
content.summary: Sighted between 8 and 12 bright lights flying in formation at what appeared to be between 500 & 1000 ft. high.

content.detailedDescription: Three of us saw the object going down in forest glowing on tree tops. called the police. two officers arrived. the two officers, my brother, friend and myself went toward the area, crossed the bare field, then over the barbed wire fence and interred the forest. we hadn't gone but maybe i suppose a 100 feet when we all heard something coming toward us within the forrest. the police had weapons drawn as i also did. it was a spooky feeling and the police nor us really felt safe to continue and backed out of the forest quickly. the police said they would have someone fly over the next day. that is the last we heard from them. before that i had seen on occasion strange lights in the sky at night like moving stars but never reported anything like that until that night seeing something landing and the trees reflecting light! then i knew for sure something had landed.
content.summary: Landing in forest and glowed on surounding  trees

content.detailedDescription:
on the night of november 19, 2011 at about 10:30 pm, i was in my house in stafford, va.  i was by myself at the time.  the weather was clear.  i walked over to close my back door and noticed through my sliding door a very bright object in the sky, toward the east.  the angle of elevation from my viewpoint was probably about 45 degrees.  the big lights were white, but it also had a few blinking red lights, not the normal red and green lights you would see on the wings of a commercial airplane.  i am accustomed to seeing planes in the night sky as we are on a path toward the dc airports.  this was much lower than the planes normally fly and was traveling roughly north to south rather than the normal south to north-flying planes we are accustomed to seeing at night heading toward the airports.  my first thought was that it must be a helicopter with searchlights and i wondered for whom or what they might be searching.  there was another plane in the area when i noticed the object, but it was much higher and appeared to be just a plane on its normal route toward the airport.

     as i continued to watch it, the object moved very slowly in a southerly direction.  i noticed that the extremely bright lights were not aimed at the ground as if it were a search helicopter.  it moved behind the trees in back of my house.  i thought it was strange, but figured i���d seen the last of it so i went and sat down.  from my chair where i was watching tv i can see that same section of the sky. maybe 5 or 10 minutes later, i saw what i assume was the same object traveling back this way, south to north.  as it got closer, it slowly turned and moved toward my house, just over the power lines.  when it turned toward me i could see that it was very large and had 3 huge, round white lights spaced widely and evenly across the front.  i could see for certain by now that it was not a helicopter.  plus, we see and hear plenty of helicopters here due to our proximity to the quantico marine corps base and other military installations.  i am very familiar with the loud sound of a helicopter going by.  as it approached, i began to hear that it was only making a low sound.  

     i walked out onto my back porch and watched as it got closer and closer.  it appeared to be getting lower toward the ground.  for some reason, i wasn���t afraid that it was going to crash, i assume because i could tell how slowly it was moving and it seemed to be under control.  it was simply mesmerizing and i was transfixed watching it.  i was frustrated that i was home alone and couldn���t yell for someone to come see what i was seeing.  as i watched with my jaw dropped, it glided by very slowly and rather quietly, but not silently, almost overhead.  from my porch, it appeared to pass about 30-50 feet to the south of me.  i would compare the sound and movement to a boat with a trolling motor, only flying, or the sound somewhat like a lawnmower in the distance.  it certainly wasn���t the sound of a normal plane engine, which would have been rather deafening at that close range.  i am not familiar with a plane that can fly that quietly and slowly or with the configuration of the 3 huge lights.  

     as it passed by, the intensity of the lights was no longer interfering with my view of the object.  i was looking at it from underneath so i could make out the shape, probably aided by the small streetlight that is almost below where it passed.  it was dark and appeared to be somewhat of a boomerang shape.  there were no lights on the underneath side.  if i were to compare it to a full moon, i���d estimate that from side to side it would be larger than 10 or 12 moons.  it���s difficult to say at night, but i���d guess it was about 200 feet above the ground.  from the time it first came into view from underneath until it went over the trees was about 10 seconds.  i could still see it through the small stand of trees beside my house, but i didn���t have an unobstructed view any more.  it was like standing on the runway if a 747 could glide quietly in for a landing, except it wasn���t shaped like a commercial airplane.  it was quite large. 

     it continued gliding across the road in front of my house, and across the field as it curved toward the south and disappeared beyond the trees.  i continued to watch for a while, then went inside to find a camera in case it came back.  my husband had taken our camera on a trip, our video camera's battery was dead (probably not caused by the object), and our old film camera also had a dead 6-volt battery, for which i had no replacement.  i plugged in the battery for the video camera just in case, but never got a picture.  i turned on the radio to see if anyone called in a report, but didn't hear any news.  

     a little while later, maybe 15 or 20 minutes, one of my sons came home and i told him what i had seen.  within about another 20 minutes, i saw bright lights again traveling from north to south, similar to where i had seen them the first time.  at this point, my son looked out and saw the object and commented on how bright and low it was.  he watched until it disappeared behind the trees in our yard.  typical of his not wanting to appear too excited and since he hadn���t witnessed what i had seen before, he went back into the kitchen, but i walked out behind my house so i could see behind the trees and watched as it moved south.  it never disappeared from sight, but eventually i determined that it was moving closer again and a little higher in the sky.  oddly, the appearance of the lights didn���t change like it had turned around ��� more like it was backing up.  the bright lights were no longer visible.  it came back the way it went, behind my house, higher this time and moving more quickly, but with no white lights on the front, just the red flashing lights on the body.  i watched as it flew north and out of sight.  that was the last i saw of it.  

     there are several rows of high-tension power lines behind my house, running somewhat north and south.  it was over these at some points, but didn���t necessarily follow the lines, especially when it headed south ��� the lines run a little more south-west and it traveled a little more south-east.  and, of course, when it turned and came toward me and continued in a slow circle to the south it wasn���t over the lines.  other than my son, who just got a brief look at the object when it was more in the distance, i���m not aware of any other witnesses, although i don���t know how anyone out at that time could have missed it if it passed near them as low and slow as it was here.  

     this is the second time i have seen something unusual behind my house.  the first time was a night almost two years ago and involved something large with only red lights, some blinking and some steady, descending into view through my back door then quickly flipping one end downward and rapidly descending out of sight behind the small hill in my back yard, at about a 45 ��� 50 degree angle, into the trees or the creek.  that whole incident lasted only maybe 5 or 10 seconds.  my first thought was that a plane had caught a wing on the power line and gone down.  my husband and i ran outside but never saw anything more.  from where he was sitting, he didn���t see the lights but followed me out based on my reaction of shock.  as i thought about it, i realized it didn���t have any white lights like a plane or helicopter would normally have at night and there was no loud noise as a plane or helicopter would have made at that distance.

     i���ve lived in this house for 24 years and have seen plenty of planes and helicopters out the back door and windows, as that is where my den is and my chair faces toward that direction.  these two incidents were definitely unusual.  i know what they weren���t ��� weather balloons, swamp gas, ball lightning��� but i���d certainly like to know what they were.  if the large object that nearly flew over my house is military and it���s ours, then good for us.  i don���t know why they would test fly it low over a housing development in northern virginia, though.  very puzzling.  i can���t say that what i saw was an extra-terrestrial ufo, but it was f. and it was an o. and it was definitely u. to me.  if someone can give me a plausible explanation that would be great because no one with whom i���ve spoken has been able to come up with one.




this is the statement from my son:

     on the night of november 19, 2011 i came home around 11:00 pm and saw my mom standing on the back deck looking up into the sky.  she explained to me that she had just been watching a large aircraft that had been slowly moving through the sky at a low altitude, with a strange light pattern that didn���t resemble an airplane.  because we live near quantico, i said it could have been one of their planes and went inside.  about 20 minutes later, she said she saw it outside again so we walked out onto the back porch and saw a much brighter than normal aircraft flying just over the tree line, heading south.    it was moving slower than the airplanes that we frequently see.  the lights on it didn���t resemble the lights on a normal airplane.  it had extremely large front white lights that didn���t shoot a beam forward like headlights, but lit up a large area around the front of the aircraft.  it seemed to be very large, bigger than a regular jet airplane, which we often see flying behind our house.  

     the aircraft continued along the tree line from our vantage point until i could no longer see it through the trees from the porch.  i thought it was gone, so i walked back into the house, but my mom walked back up onto the hill to see if she could get a better look at it.  i have seen airplanes fly over the house my entire life since we are on one of the flight paths for washington airports and we live near quantico.  this didn���t resemble any passenger jet or any other aircraft i���ve seen over the years.  when passenger jets, helicopters and military aircraft fly over, they make a clearly audible sound.  during the time i observed the aircraft, i didn���t hear any sound coming from it.  i���m curious to know what it was.
content.distance: 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile
content.summary: Very large boomerang shaped object with 3 extremely bright white lights across front gliding slowly, quietly, and very low behind my house, then almost over my house

content.detailedDescription: I was driving my daughter to work at 6:50 am on 11/29/11. my daughter (19 years old) and i (54 years old) were initially drawn to lights in the sky. the lights were strange because they were exceptionally bright and looked different than normal aircraft lights. it appeared to be a bright light with smaller lights below it, i thought i could see a very small tail, like an aircraft, but the entire shape looked more round, however i could not clearly make out the shape, only the lights were very clear. of course, i initially thought it was an aircraft just playing tricks with my eyes, but it then started rapidly moving in a horizontal direction and stop, then rapidly in a vertical direction and then stop. i don���t believe, nor have i ever believed in ufo���s, but i was completely baffled, (and a little freaked out) so i turned my vehicle in a way i could keep watching this object. it moved 6-8 times in these incredibly quick vertical/horizontal movements covering a distance that no aircraft could cover and then seem to stop in an instant. both my daughter and i witnessed this. i eventually had to go by a very large building and when i came out from the building i could not find the object again. all i can say is that i can���t explain what i saw but it is something i won���t soon forget. brian
content.summary: Object moving rapidly in a horozontal/vertical direction covering large distances.

content.detailedDescription: Was laying in bed early on the morning of november 28th,2011.  heard a sound that sounded like the power in my house going out but was louder and didnt affect my power at all.  felt a weird electricity in the air but it slowly went away.  about 20-30 minutes later heard the same electronic wave of a noise, then saw a huge blue light explode in the sky out of my window.  happened 3 times then was not seen again.
content.summary: Flashing blue light in the sky preceded by what felt and sounded like electric shock

content.detailedDescription:
While having my bonfire talking to my friend i suddenly spot a large glowing white object within the clouds. as i look at it the white glowing object it immediatly jests off to the east in a straight line. 

my reaction: i got up out of my seat and ran to get a view of where it might be but i reacted to late.

15 mins later: my friend and i both hear a dog barking we didn't think to much of it at first. a short moment passes without much noise as we walk back to the house we hear some more dog barking but this time we hear a female human sound like falling and hurtingherself. so naturally i wanted to go help but my friend had a really unsettling feeling about this and urged me not to go. well as we're talking about it we noticed a few low level noises all seemed ok until the screaming......... the sound of this screaming sounded like a dog yelping but morphed into what quite clearly was a woman. we're petrified by what we're hearing. long yelping female gurgling choking coughing dogish humanish female very very loud screams.

me and my close friend now have problems sleeping and wish to god we never heard what we heard.

furthermore i asked around a little and i spoke with an older woman who also heard the very loud screams and said it was like nothing she has ever heard before in all of her days.

i went to the station and made a report about it the officer was of course very dismissive.
content.summary: First saw ufo. then dog bark turned into long yelping human dog yelping and then female screaming

content.detailedDescription:
I was at montanya de montjuïc of barcelona with my family.
i took many pictures there.
when i took these pictures, i didn't recognize anything special.
when i checked my picture at hotel, i found this picture.
befor and after this picture, there are no objects like this one.
content.summary: I didn't recognize it when i took a picture

content.detailedDescription:
I was at montanya de montjuïc of barcelona with my family.
i took many pictures there.
when i took these pictures, i didn't recognize anything special.
when i checked my picture at hotel, i found this picture.
befor and after this picture, there are no objects like this one.
content.summary: I didn't recognize it when i took a picture

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking out wal-mart around a quarter till seven in the evening on thanksgiving day when i noticed unusual lights in the sky coming towards my direction out of the north east. there were three large white lights and a center strobe light. the craft was black in color and appeared to be triangular in shaped. the three white lights were coming from the bottom of the craft. the first white was on the front corner of the craft. the second white light was on the bottom left corner and one on the bottom right.  on the bottom center of the craft there was a strobe light. i could not see any reflection of any kind off the air craft from the strobe. 
i wouldn���t begin to be able to say how high it was. it craft mover slower than a cessna air plane but faster than a hot air balloon. as the craft was passing me i didn���t hear any sounds immediately. after it got a short distance away from me i could hear a sound that was a combination of a jet engine and the sound of hot air balloon when they use the burners to fill the balloon up. 
as the craft was heading away from me i noticed that it lifted the right side like it was going to turn left. instead it slid to the left a little bit then back to the right. the amount of time that i watched the craft was only for about thirty seconds to a minute. the craft did not go directly over my head, but it wouldn���t have taken the craft much for it to go over me. the turns were more like a slide, not the way a normal plain would turn or slide from its left or right side while in the air.
content.summary: I seen the ufo walking out of walmart in the evening. it was a clear night out.

content.detailedDescription: Have been seeing at night very bright lights in the sky east of my home when out on my deck with my dogs after dark. this one tonight was more due east of me and approximately one hour later has moved closer toward my home but slightly to the south, so it traveled in an hour south west. but the movement is gradual. it is very bright with bright lights shining off like one would draw a sunshine with the lines extending from the sun. but this one also has lights flashing as if around it's perimeter in green and red. it moves slightly up and down or seems to orbit around. since late summer this is not the first time i have witnessed strange bright lights hovering. my husband has also seen them and being a navy man, says these lights are brighter than any stars he saw while out on the ocean. my property is rural, close to the area known as chapel hill bordering lafayette, johnson and jackson county in missouri. just looked again about 20 minutes from the beginning of this report and object has moved a bit closer which would be west and still a bit south.I made my first report to the highway patrol late summer and described the light and it's movement. the dispatcher that answered after hearing my description said "that is just how my husband described it when he saw it..Drops down and was jerky moving".
content.summary: Noticed very bright more than a starburst light while out on deck. lights flashed with red and green and bright rays shooting off the object.. was more east  then within hour moved more toward my home but to the south a bit. watched for over hour .

content.detailedDescription:
While sitting in my yard stargazing looking sw towards the gulf around 8:30pm. i was waiting and hoping for some meteor activity. i have noticed a lot (4 in a week) of shooting stars lately between sunset and 10pm.
 it was a beautiful clear evening. i was looking at the same pulsing blue star that i have enjoyed for years when all of a sudden i saw a dim white glow about 15d sw of the blue star. i immediately switched my focus on that glow that gradually got brighter and brighter all while staying stationary. the glow got larger and brighter and then it flashed a brilliant white light that made me see spots as you would get from a camera flash at a short distance.
 after the flash it dimmed and got smaller and then at amazing speed it either headed south or plunged down. my depth perception was affected by the flash, i had to rub my eyes to get full focus back.
 i can only describe it as a lighthouse because of the way it faded in, flashed then faded out before it moved and disappeared. i have never seen a aircraft move as fast as this light did.
 being the skeptic that i am, i immediately tried to debunk what i just witnessed. i have ruled out every feasible possibility. my first thought  was that it was a spotlight from a helicopter but the rate of speed ruled that out. then i thought it could be a meteor, but since it did not move for 10-15 seconds and then move at such a fast rate of speed ruled that out as well. my other thoughts of what it was just seem to irrational to admit to.
 it has been a week since the sighting and i have been watching the same area with nothing new to report. it was one of the few things that i can not explain.
content.summary: Lighthouse effect then flash over gulf

content.detailedDescription: I would rather not post this. i would prefer to be contacted by email.
content.summary: Very similar to the chris bledsoe sighting in 2007 as aired on planet green nov 27.

content.detailedDescription:
My son and i were driving home from lewiston maine on i-95 north, shorty before the weymouth overpass to the right of our vehicle in the sky was a bright half of triangle glowing as if it were burning with flashing lights it started to fall towards the ground then seemed to disappear and reappeared higher in elevation and further to the right, there was no noise given from the object but that is not for sure as we were in the vehicle, my son and i both witnessed the same event and were shouting "what is that!?" there is no way possible that this was any man made air craft, it moved too fast.
we were hoping you could provide us with any information of other sightings or any information at all because other people must have saw it, there were alot of people on the highway
content.summary: Upside down half of triangle glowing like fire with lights blinking hovering it fell twords the ground and disapeared, than reappeared to the right

content.detailedDescription:
I just finished work and got in my car. i sat there a minute to call my boyfriend. looking out my driver's window i observed 4 flashing lights in the near distance towards the northeast, past the far side of a lake i was parked in front of. at first the lights were stationary and blinking, maybe about 200 feet above the ground but perhaps around a 1/2-3/4 mile from where i was parked. it was dark and i thought they were lights on a tower; but then one of the lights (it was blue) moved slowly under a red light and i realized there were four independent lights. i believe one was blue and three were red (the primary colors of each). they formed a triangle shape in the air with three on the left side and a seperate one forming the triangle to the right. they hovered blinking and changing colors from red to blue, bright intense, glowing light. i was telling my boyfriend this on the phone, and of course, he didn't believe me. even thought the formation was "stationary" the orbs/lights moved extremely fast in each small area they were "staying" in, and if i squinted, i could see beams or trails left where each one was moving within its allotted space without breaking the triangle formation. i briefly considered going back inside to get my co-workers, but by this time, the lights/orbs were moving away from me towards the northeast, at a fair pace. not two minutes later, two helicopters headed in that general direction. by this time i was out of the parking lot and driving south, towards home, but saw the helicopters pass over me, going northeast.

this didn't surprise me much because i've seen a couple of "unusual" objects in my neighborhood, but at a greater distance, lately (i live near an airport), but neither of the objects was a plane, helicopter or anything else. one was a white round orb, that went straight up into the air and disappeared (it reminded me of a bubble in a glass of soda rising, it was quick but graceful) and i saw something else that looked like a star that was at a great distance, but it looked like it was changing colors. through binoculars i could make out that it was triangular, pyramidal shaped, transparent, but glowing with different colors like a web of plasma or electricity running around the outside of it (very bright, but very far away). it rotated and tumbled in place. i watched it for about an hour before i went into the house. i also called a tv station to see if there were any reports of it (there weren't). it was about 2:30 a.M. in mid-october. a neighbor and my boyfriend also witnessed that one, but my boyfriend thinks it was a star. it was not. (both of those sightings were in october of this year, a couple of weeks apart). aside from these incidents, i have never had any knowm contact with ufos or aliens.
content.summary: 4 hovering light orbs that formed triangle, then changed pattern

content.detailedDescription:
My friend has some property in lucern valley,(n-e of big bear lake?)when his generator is off it is pitch black out there and you can see all the stars at night, it's off the main power and water grid and only a weekend get away place that i only go to once or twice a year.

after thanksgiving dinner was over we all went to sleep fairly early, 630pm or so. there was still a fire in the pit but we were all fat and happy full of turkey and gravy etc. i woke up to hit the bathroom then looked at my cell to check the time, man only 10:30? (i thought to myself) i might as well stoke the fire and crack a beer may be then i can go back to sleep? 
so i grabbed some fire wood tossed it on, cracked the beer in my hand and tilted my head back to take a sip, and there it was in front of my face!

i didn't know what to think or do, i was frozen in place shocked at what i was witnessing!

it lit up these laser like bars that turned the thing from a sphere to a, sphere with a square looking lamp shade type look around it. 
the glow from the bars changed the look from the a mid blue glowing color
to a light blue lamp shade between these solid white bars of light.

held that position for 10-15 seconds or more?. 

then it moved away from from me so fast that i thought it disappeared?
i was standing with big bear mountain at my right side.

it then appeared at an unknown distance away and did the same thing again.
i only reason i noticed it was because the bars lit up and made it more visible. 
then it was more to my right.

it then came back to me not so close but still to my right.
same thing lit up 10-15 then back to sphere,
went away to the right distance did the same thing,

at this point i was checking the sky for a bigger ship that this might have come from when i looked to the first point i think it came from i think i was looking at the north star because it was the brightest thing in the sky.

when i saw that it was going away from me i was more at ease with what was happening when i first saw this thing the hair on all of me stuld up!

it zig zagged down the valley towards big bear mountain , i was on top of the adjacent hill so i saw that it was keeping the same elevation to the ground it looked as if it was mapping or scanning like an in atmosphere satilight.

as it went down towards the valley it went under the skyline and i saw an even better view of it and it was more sharp to my eyes because the background was all black area with a light here and there.

i watched this thing until i couldn't see it anymore i don't know when it was gone it was just gone. i watched it until it went to big bear peak.


 there were plane lights in the air that night but they were so far away and there flashing lights were only little specs like flashing stars compared to this thing that (i thought if at first sight if this thing lands i need some clean underwear), and hoped they would be friendly!
later i thought its only a probing thing still?

the next night i couldn't even sleep the night through without waking in thought of getting up and seeing what ever it was again before i went back to the city. i could not take my eyes off the night sky thinking it might be behind me or further in front of me!
i totally lost sleep over this all weekend my friends think ,what ever, but i was so stunned and focused in disbelief on this thing, i didn,t even yell hea!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Round sphere hovered (lit near virtical beams of light anound it)15sds(lights went out)moved and  and did same thing

content.detailedDescription: February 2nd 2011. i took photos of odd clouds to me. four months later i downloaded my phone pics onto my computer.  three months after that i decided to look for ufos on my photos.  i ran into these three back to back photos.  i zoomed and enhanced and found, what i believe is two clouds one ufo. you be the judge.
content.summary: Did not see while taking photos, only looking at clouds

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were fishing on a local lake. we had been there since 3pm, at 745pm my friend casted out tward shore. i was casting about 30 yards to the right of him. i saw him twitch in the corner of my eye. he quietly said as he was staring tward shore "there's and alien over there" he immediately repeat "there's an alien over there" this time very loudly and began yelling at me to look. as this was happening i heard branches and sticks breaking just behind a few bushes at the edge of shore. i watched the woods in the direction that the sound was moving toward. the noises stopped and maybe ten to fifteen seconds later i saw what appeared to be a person with extremly long arms down to where i saw it's knees bending. a very large head, rounded at the top with a very pronounced chin. it was very skinny, skinny enough that if it was a person they were starving. there was no clothing visible, the legs and arms were also very skinny and no reproductive organs were visible. the way it walked reminded me of the old film of bigfoot almost perfectly. we started leaving the area. there is a small wooded peninsula directly adjacent to the direction that it had walked. as we passed it i was watching the woods closely and saw what appeared to be a face. rounded at the top and with a pronounced chin it turned to follow our movement passed. it had large oval black eyes with a small mouth, grey skinned, and there was a notable crease running down its forehead. i couldn't see any nose of any kind. once we had passed we did not see it again.
content.summary: Non-human sighting

content.detailedDescription:
Oct. 2011 about 9:30 at night on murfreesboro hwy/ 41 there is a dark 6 mile stretch of road. we were heading from town (manchester,tn.) toward the interstate and a bp gas station(busy corner truck stop and market). we (3 of us in the car) have witnessed this 3 different times now within a months time. all 3 events each time took place about mid-way on this 6 mile stretch. around where some fields are.

we witnessed a good size orange to amber colored orb hovering just above the treeline, it almost looked like a big orange star but stars do not hover above a treeline, that's what caught our eye, it's placement seemed odd. 

we take this road 5 times a week and noticed as we were driving up on it that it looked very out of place. i then pulled over on the shoulder of the road to get a better look. the orb hovered for a few seconds more and then seem to disappear or change into what looked like a white star like object, it moved through the sky very fluently and went over to what we thought was just a star (also pretty low in the sky), it connected to it and moved off as one. then it seemed to turn into a white flashing light object and began moving at a high velocity, we watched it until it moved out of our field of vision. the orange orb thing was almost like a portal or host that this object came out of or so it seemed? it was very amazing to see to say the least...
content.summary: Manchester,tn orange/amber orb with flashing lights that came out of it. hwy 41

content.detailedDescription: I was smokinga cigarrette before the chiefs game was going to start aproximately 7pm on my back porch. i saw 5 lights with flashing lights beneath them moving towards me over the house behind mine. it was very slow moving from west to east. it came directly over me and then proceeded to change direction and head south from there at the same speed in the same formation. i called to my girlfriend who was in the af for 4 years to come see it. she came out side while i snapped 3 pictures and i asked her"if those were planes flying in formation" to which she replied "planes make a noise when they fly that low and that was not planes". the craft seemed to move south and then continue to hover around south of us for at least 30 minutes. there was also a very bright light way hhigher in the sky that remained in the same place from 7pm until i went to bed at 12pm. this was a secondary light but much brghter and in the same exact plaec for 4 hours. both were witnessed by mysel and my girlfriend. i physically felt fine. i dont drink so i was fully sober and not feeling any physical effects.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Flew quietly over the house in front of me then changed direction

content.detailedDescription:
Flight information withheld.

the pictures taken were in flight of the sunset. approximately 10 pictures were taken three caught something.  the witness did not see the object only caught it on the camera by accident.  the witness was sitting in a window seat and was taking pictures of the sunset with an iphone. in an effort to get more of the picture of the sunset, some of the photos were taken with the iphone camera tilted at an angle so that the photo would capture above the plane at angle.  the area in which some of these photos were taken was physically impossible to see looking out the window. there was no flash used. most of the photos came out fine accept for three. 
the photo with the three lights has approximately 12 surrounding smaller lights which appear to be reflective lighting. it is hard to see in the original photo.  in an effort to capture it, we have included a photos with a brightness, contrast and zoom adjustment.
content.summary: 3 pictures taken from a commercial airline with a tilted iphone camera, something above the plane at an angle that would not have been seen without the camera

content.detailedDescription:
I'm in the forest, closes from strasbourg. my dog is with me. 
when i lived, my dog barks. i dont't understood. and i don't no why, but i looked up, and i see a wird light. it's like a moon, but close to me. it shines with a blue ���trznge. j is still there ... and then suddenly it rise into the sky. i felt my feet all cold, i vomited. my dog ​​took me over law  law, he was scared ....

i returned as fast as i could on my house.
content.summary: I seend, a light in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
We were decorating our christmas tree, and i stepped outside to see how it looked from the front of our house and was distracted by 6 or 7 bright orange lights rising to the east over the wasatch mountain range.   it was a very clear night just a little after 9pm.  at first, there were 5 or 6 lights rising in a column which then separated, spreading out in different directions.  i stood for a moment, wondering what the heck they were.  they were brighter and larger than the stars in the sky and moving in an upward direction.  i stepped into the house and asked for my husband to come look.  he is retired military and seems to know a great deal about aircraft, so i thought he could tell me what they were.  he stepped outside with me and just stood and watched with me in silence for a few moments and then said, "i don't know what those are.  they're not planes.  it's totally quiet, though.  listen to the dogs."  the neighborhood dogs all seemed to be barking.  he stepped into the house, turned off all the lights, and asked for the other two adults in the house to come outside.  
   together, we watched as all but one blinked out after only a few minutes, and the last one remained stationary for another minute or so.  as that one blinked out, we noticed another rising more slowly below it.  this final light was the brightest, and we were able to watch it for nearly 5 minutes as it rose upward then sat stationary for about 30 seconds.  it flashed red and blinked out, also.  i thought it was gone, but one of the other adults pointed out that the object was still faintly visible.  it appeared white and ascended to the north for several minutes, where we finally lost track of it.  
    we live near hill air force base, and we are accustomed to seeing objects in the sky.  we agreed that they were not jets, helicopters, or any other aircraft that we are used to seeing.  we never did hear any sound other than barking dogs.  i initially thought perhaps they were flares, but the objects moved upward, hovered, and changed direction.  also, the lights were orange and round/symmetrical.  the odd way the last light flashed red before blinking out was unlike anything i have seen before.  
    i have been listening to local news for reports of weather balloons or flares or any kind of military testing in the area; although, i'm sure that's not what this was.  i have also been checking ufo reporting sites, and looking online for any blog or other reports from anyone else who may have seen these lights.  we live in a very populated area, so i don't understand why no one else noticed or reported them.  the joke around our house is that the e.T.'s are coming.  we laugh about it, but all of us feel that we saw something we don't understand.  my husband said that he felt very unsafe when he saw those lights.  the were just too different from anything he has ever seen (the way they moved quickly, stopped, then changed direction, then blinking out but still being present).
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 6 or more orange lights in the sky, moving upward in different directions

content.detailedDescription: Outside at 9:00 pm i was outside thinking of putting christmas lights up when i had the feeling to look up.Three disks in a triangle pattern flew over low to the ground,the had a orange glow to them.Shortly after 2 jets went by at the same height and looked military.Then 5 disks flew over and made a pattern.They were higher than the others.That's when 5 white orbs appeared and their was a disk with flashing lights on either side of the orbs evenly which could have made it one ship then 2 disks moved to the left each higher and evenly distanced and also went from glowing and when stopped flashing blue and white.My wife had joined me after yelling for her and seen the formation after they stopped.After about 3 minutes i ran for my camera and returned and they were gone.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 8 orange disks with flashing lights flew over or home with 5 white orbs and 2 millitary jets.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were at the new football staduim at james madison university watching the game.  it was the beginning of the third quarter, and there was no longer any sunlight in the staduim, but the setting sun was still shining above the horizon. my wife, looking up overhead, said "what's that"  i observed a brilliant spherical object which appeared to be 1 cm to the naked eye traveled from south to north (right to left). when i noticed it, it was about 30 degrees right of reaching its closest point overhead.  the object was totally silent, and left no visible trail such as smoke, debris or exhaust. there was no aura or any type of visible distortion of the light surrounding the object. from my 8 years experience as a navy f-14 pilot with 1700 hours, i would estimate that the object was at an altitude of approximately 1000 feet above the ground, at an estimated speed of  600 - 700 knots, and would have an actual diameter of 10 to 15 feet.  as the object was traveling away, it was observed to slightly vary its course from left to right and back, rather than follow a ballistic trajectory. this made it seem to me to be in to be in controlled flight. i was observing this very slight "sidewinder" motion as if looking from the rear of the object, rather than the underside, due to its relatively low altitude (i.E. if it were a jet i would have been looking up the tailpipe.)  in about 5 seconds it passed out of sight beyond the top of the north side of the football stadium. i thought immediately that it was a controlled flying object which was neither civilian nor military. my wife was in awe and said "what was that?"  i was quite elated, and said "that was a ufo!". i do not know if any of the other 25,000 people at the game saw this object, but i am quite sure that someone else must have seen it.  if you draw a n -s line on a map or photo over jmu's football field, you will have the part of the trajectory which we observed.

(name moved to fi box) cms 11/28/11 13:43 cst flg

(i actually signed up as mufon field investigator in 1994.)
content.summary: Brilliant reflective sphere, no surface or structural features, 10 -15 feet in actual diameter

content.detailedDescription: Ok, i thought my eyes were going crazy because i was driving. i looked up and it was a blimp shaped object. i told my wife it was a blimp with lights. as were still driving closer to object. than as we got closer it was not a blimp. it was something else that was hovering over the buildings as i was going down i -70 to my left that was hovering. all the cars were breaking to look at what we saw so i know we were not the only ones to see it. so it was turning doing a three sixty rotating in the air. my wife was going crazy saying that was a ufo. i thought it was a weird plane flying over the chiefs game or something, but it wasn't. it went south with us as we were driving. it was at a complete stop and was accelerating and stoping. as i stoped off my brother we saw it flying and stoping again. we saw flashes in the sky that look like a war was going on and off like a war was going on.  my wife was following the sky the whole time. you didn't hear no noise coming from the object. i say object because it was not a airplane with a couple of lights. it had a lot of lights when i first saw it. than it went to like 6 even lights under it. it seemed like it was more than one object in the sky and it was flying all south in like circle making stops. no light emitted like the first time we saw just stoping. we was wondering if anybody else came forward with seeing this yesterday. i'm truly a believer after seeing that in the sky. it was different but scary at the sane time cause we had no clue what it was doing. it was over a fastfood place and other buildings.
content.summary: Ufo sighting when driving in town from thanksgiving
